017package org.apache.juneau.http.header;
018
019import java.util.function.*;
020
021import org.apache.juneau.*;
022import org.apache.juneau.http.annotation.*;
023import org.apache.juneau.internal.*;
024
025/**
026 * Represents a parsed <l>Content-Type</l> HTTP request/response header.
027 *
028 * <p>
029 * The MIME type of this content.
030 *
031 * <h5 class='figure'>Example</h5>
032 * <p class='bcode'>
033 *    Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8
034 * </p>
035 *
036 * <h5 class='topic'>RFC2616 Specification</h5>
037 *
038 * The Content-Type entity-header field indicates the media type of the entity-body sent to the recipient or, in the
039 * case of the HEAD method, the media type that would have been sent had the request been a GET.
040 * <p class='bcode'>
041 *    Content-Type   = "Content-Type" ":" media-type
042 * </p>
043 *
044 * <p>
045 * Media types are defined in section 3.7.
046 * An example of the field is...
047 * <p class='bcode'>
048 *    Content-Type: text/html; charset=ISO-8859-4
049 * </p>
050 *
051 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
052 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/JuneauRestCommonBasics">juneau-rest-common Basics</a>
053 *    <li class='extlink'><a class="doclink" href="https://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616.html">Hypertext Transfer Protocol -- HTTP/1.1</a>
054 * </ul>
055 *
056 * @serial exclude
057 */
058@Header("Content-Type")
059public class ContentType extends BasicMediaTypeHeader {
060
061   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
062   // Static
063   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
064
065   private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
066   private static final String NAME = "Content-Type";
067
068   private static Cache<String,ContentType> CACHE = Cache.of(String.class, ContentType.class).build();
069
070   // Constants
071   @SuppressWarnings("javadoc")
072   public static final ContentType
073      APPLICATION_ATOM_XML = of("application/atom+xml"),
074      APPLICATION_FORM_URLENCODED = of("application/x-www-form-urlencoded"),
075      APPLICATION_JSON = of("application/json"),
076      APPLICATION_OCTET_STREAM = of("application/octet-stream"),
077      APPLICATION_SOAP_XML = of("application/soap+xml"),
078      APPLICATION_SVG_XML = of("application/svg+xml"),
079      APPLICATION_XHTML_XML = of("application/xhtml+xml"),
080      APPLICATION_XML = of("application/xml"),
081      IMAGE_BMP = of("image/bmp"),
082      IMAGE_GIF = of("image/gif"),
083      IMAGE_JPEG = of("image/jpeg"),
084      IMAGE_PNG = of("image/png"),
085      IMAGE_SVG = of("image/svg+xml"),
086      IMAGE_TIFF = of("image/tiff"),
087      IMAGE_WEBP = of("image/webp"),
088      MULTIPART_FORM_DATA = of("multipart/form-data"),
089      TEXT_HTML = of("text/html"),
090      TEXT_OPENAPI = of("text/openapi"),
091      TEXT_PLAIN = of("text/plain"),
092      TEXT_XML = of("text/xml"),
093      WILDCARD = of("*/*"),
094      NULL = new ContentType((String)null);
095
096   /**
097    * Static creator.
098    *
099    * @param value
100    *    The header value.
101    *    <br>Must be parsable by {@link MediaType#of(String)}.
102    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk>.
103    * @return A new header bean, or <jk>null</jk> if the value is <jk>null</jk>.
104    */
105   public static ContentType of(String value) {
106      return value == null ? null : CACHE.get(value, ()->new ContentType(value));
107   }
108
109   /**
110    * Static creator.
111    *
112    * @param value
113    *    The header value.
114    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk>.
115    * @return A new header bean, or <jk>null</jk> if the value is <jk>null</jk>.
116    */
117   public static ContentType of(MediaType value) {
118      return value == null ? null : new ContentType(value);
119   }
120
121   /**
122    * Static creator with delayed value.
123    *
124    * <p>
125    * Header value is re-evaluated on each call to {@link #getValue()}.
126    *
127    * @param value
128    *    The header value.
129    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk>.
130    * @return A new header bean, or <jk>null</jk> if the value is <jk>null</jk>.
131    */
132   public static ContentType of(Supplier<MediaType> value) {
133      return value == null ? null : new ContentType(value);
134   }
135
136   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
137   // Instance
138   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
139
140   /**
141    * Constructor.
142    *
143    * @param value
144    *    The header value.
145    *    <br>Must be parsable by {@link MediaType#of(String)}.
146    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk>.
147    */
148   public ContentType(String value) {
149      super(NAME, value);
150   }
151
152   /**
153    * Constructor.
154    *
155    * @param value
156    *    The header value.
157    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk>.
158    */
159   public ContentType(MediaType value) {
160      super(NAME, value);
161   }
162
163   /**
164    * Constructor with delayed value.
165    *
166    * <p>
167    * Header value is re-evaluated on each call to {@link #getValue()}.
168    *
169    * @param value
170    *    The supplier of the header value.
171    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk>.
172    */
173   public ContentType(Supplier<MediaType> value) {
174      super(NAME, value);
175   }
176}
